entry.title: Getting started with raspberry Pi
entry.content:
This page is mostly for my own reference on how I get the RasPi booted and installed with the different OS’s

Raspbian

For installing raspbian I’ve found great help in the following pages:

  • Install without keyboard and mouse by Vasco Pinho
  • Install Raspbian Wheezy Linux to Raspberry Pi using Linux by Christos Manios

And after some trouble with the wifi I found great help in this post: * PINGBIN

Other tips and tricks

I followed this guide for setting up the pi for using a laptop as both remote monitor and keyboard!
